title: Jumeirah Group announces partnership with Royal Albert Hall
text:
Jumeirah Group announces partnership with Royal Albert Hall Jumeirah Group announces partnership with Royal Albert Hall Details Category: Hotel   11:00 Jumeirah Group, the global luxury hotel company and a member of Dubai Holding, has entered into an exclusive two-year partnership with Royal Albert Hall. The luxury hotel Jumeirah Carlton Tower has been named as the preferred five-star hotel partner of London’s most iconic concert venue. 
The five-star Jumeirah Carlton Tower located just off Sloane Street in the heart of Knightsbridge, is ideally-located within walking distance of the Hall, and provides the ultimate level of luxury and comfort in London, offering 216 guest rooms, including 58 suites. In addition to Jumeirah Carlton Tower, the Jumeirah Group offers Mayfair-based luxury hotel residences Grosvenor House Apartments by Jumeirah Living, for a unique contemporary experience in one of their 130 serviced residences. Hosting over 390 shows annually in its auditorium, and another 400 beyond the main stage, the Hall offers something for everyone throughout the year, from opera, ballet, tennis, rock, pop, classical jazz or world music. Guests at Jumeirah Carlton Tower will be able to take advantage of the fun-packed calendar of events offered by this world-class venue, and benefit from access to tickets and exclusive behind-the-scenes tours. Austin Frost, Vice President of Sales & Marketing Europe, Jumeirah Group, said: “This exciting partnership with Royal Albert Hall, one of London’s most prestigious venues, steeped in history, further establishes our London properties as part of the cultural fabric of the city. At a group level, we are always exploring new, innovative ways of enhancing our guests’ stay with us; and creating places where art, culture and comfort can all mix is an important part of this.” Philip Marshall, Director of Business Development at the Royal Albert Hall, said: “We want all our visitors to have an unforgettable experience at the Hall. This means wonderful performances on stage and exceptional customer service throughout. We are delighted to partner with Jumeirah Hotels & Resorts, who share these values.” The partnership between Jumeirah Group and Royal Albert Hall will run until 2017 and will provide guests at their London properties with exclusive access to an exciting programme of internationally-renowned performances.
